notes.body: Hello Farhan,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  Thank you for reaching out to us.  We understand your concern regarding the payment issue while placing an order for your father in Bhopal. We would like to inform you that PharmEasy currently does not accept international credit or debit cards for payments. Only India-issued cards and payment methods are supported on our platform.  You may consider asking a family member or someone in India to complete the payment using an Indian payment method.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.       Regards,  Devdas.
notes.body_html:
Hello Farhan,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

Thank you for reaching out to us.

We understand your concern regarding the payment issue while placing an order for your father in Bhopal. We would like to inform you that PharmEasy currently does not accept international credit or debit cards for payments. Only India-issued cards and payment methods are supported on our platform.

You may consider asking a family member or someone in India to complete the payment using an Indian payment method.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Devdas.

notes.body: Hello Smrutiranjan,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #653093104574267392-70957, I am sorry to know you have not received the medicine you ordered. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologise for the inconvenience caused to you.     I am highlighting your concern to the Escalation team, and our team will investigate it. If the medicine is found to be missing, the refund amount of Rs. 1841.8 will be initiated. Post initiation of refund, the amount will be credited to your payment source within 5 to 7 working days.     You can expect the resolution within 24 to 48 hours. We will get back to you with an update once we receive it.      Further, was the parcel intact, or was there any damage from the outside at the time of delivery?     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Habiba

notes.body: Hello Smrutiranjan,     Greetings from PharmEasy!   This email is with regard to your order #653093104574267392-70957, I see your concern was highlighted for the missing item. notes.body: Hello Aditya,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     We understand you wish to permanently delete your account with PharmEasy. We would be unable to delete the account from our database. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant governmental authorities.      Please note that once the account is deactivated, we are unable to process any request or reactivate the account.     Once your request has been processed in the system, our agent will call within 24 to 48 hours on a registered mobile number and confirm if you have requested account deactivation. After verification, an OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number.  Once the OTP is verified, the agent will go ahead and deactivate your account       Kindly confirm so that we can proceed with the request.     Awaiting your earliest response.     Regards,  Habiba
notes.body_html:
Hello Aditya,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

We understand you wish to permanently delete your account with PharmEasy. We would be unable to delete the account from our database. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant governmental authorities. 

Please note that once the account is deactivated, we are unable to process any request or reactivate the account.

Once your request has been processed in the system, our agent will call within 24 to 48 hours on a registered mobile number and confirm if you have requested account deactivation. After verification, an OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number.  Once the OTP is verified, the agent will go ahead and deactivate your account  

Kindly confirm so that we can proceed with the request.

Awaiting your earliest response.

Regards,
Habiba

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear Sir/Madam,


I hope this message finds you well.

My name is Hiromi Asaoka, and I am reaching out on behalf of Highreso Co.,
Ltd., a Japanese GPU cloud provider.

We are planning to expand our GPU cloud business in India and would like to
explore potential collaboration opportunities with your organization,
particularly in the following areas:

   - High-performance GPU clouds (H200 / B200 / RTX Pro 6000, etc.)
   - Managed GPU clusters, and enterprise AI platforms
   - Long-term rental, purchase, or hybrid commercial models of GPU clouds

Our team will be visiting Bengaluru and Delhi from December 8 to 10, 2025,
and we would greatly appreciate the opportunity to meet with you to discuss
how we can support your current and future AI initiatives.

May we kindly request a meeting at your office or via video conference
during our visit? We would be pleased to share technical specifications,
pricing models, and recent enterprise use cases during the discussion.

Please let us know your availability at your convenience.

Thank you very much, and we look forward to the opportunity to collaborate.


Warm regards,



Hiromi Asaoka, Ph.D.


Highreso Co., Ltd.
Tokyo, Japan
E-mail: hiromi-asaoka@highreso.co.jp
https://highreso.jp/

--

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Meeting Request – Collaboration on GPU Infrastructure Solutions in India
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I hope this message finds you well.
My name is Hiromi Asaoka, and I am reaching out on behalf of Highreso Co., Ltd., a Japanese GPU cloud provider.
We are planning to expand our GPU cloud business in India and would like to explore potential collaboration opportunities with your organization, particularly in the following areas:
  • High-performance GPU clouds (H200 / B200 / RTX Pro 6000, etc.)
  • Managed GPU clusters, and enterprise AI platforms
  • Long-term rental, purchase, or hybrid commercial models of GPU clouds
Our team will be visiting Bengaluru and Delhi from December 8 to 10, 2025, and we would greatly appreciate the opportunity to meet with you to discuss how we can support your current and future AI initiatives.
May we kindly request a meeting at your office or via video conference during our visit? We would be pleased to share technical specifications, pricing models, and recent enterprise use cases during the discussion.
Please let us know your availability at your convenience.
Thank you very much, and we look forward to the opportunity to collaborate.

Warm regards,
 
Hiromi Asaoka, Ph.D.
 
Highreso Co., Ltd.
Tokyo, Japan
E-mail: hiromi-asaoka@highreso.co.jp
https://highreso.jp/

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Hi Team,

I hope you’re doing well.

My name is Vruddhi Madhani, Co-Founder of BNM WealthPlay Pvt. Ltd., the company behind Broke No More — a new-age personal finance and money-management app designed specifically for India’s Gen Z and young working professionals.

We are preparing for our launch and are building a Deals & Rewards Hub inside the app, where users will receive curated offers from top brands across e-commerce, food, lifestyle, electronics, beauty, health and travel.

Your brand is one of the most requested by our early audience, which is why I’m reaching out for a possible partnership.

⭐ What We Are Looking For

We would like to integrate your brand’s:

Affiliate program
Offer links / deal feeds
Coupon codes
Trackable URLs (if available)
API access (optional)

Our goal is to drive high-intent traffic directly from our app to your platform, creating a win-win setup where:

✔ You get new customers + sales

✔ Our users get exclusive savings

✔ We increase engagement and retention

⭐ About Broke No More

Broke No More is a smart AI-driven finance app with features including:

AI spend analysis
Debt & EMI tracker
SIP & investment analysis
Stock scanner with market summaries
Deals hub showcasing top offers
Personalized recommendations

Our early testers (1,000+ users) have shown extremely high interest in a centralised place for top brand discounts, especially from brands like yours.

⭐ How We Want to Partner

We are open to:

Integrating your affiliate program
Promoting your offers within our app
Highlighting your brand during onboarding
Featuring exclusive deals (if available)
Collaborations or co-marketing campaigns

Traffic sources are 100% app-based, transparent, and high-conversion.

⭐ Request

Kindly share:

Affiliate partnership details
Offer feed / coupon access
API/documents
Onboarding steps
Any requirements on your end

We are ready to integrate immediately.

Looking forward to building a strong partnership with [Brand Name].

Warm regards,
Vruddhi Madhani
Co-Founder — BNM WealthPlay Pvt. Ltd.
Product: Broke No More
Email: brokenomore71@gmail.com
Phone: +91 9819739801
Mumbai, India

Sent from my iPhone
--

With regards to your order #651240969481936896-75237, I can see your order has been dispatched, and it is being delivered by a courier partner. Please accept my apologies for the same. ​  As there is a delay, I will escalate this concern to our Courier partner and will request them to deliver your order at the earliest. You can expect an update within 24 - 48 hours.    You can also track your order on the link below with the help of the AWB number.  Link: https://www.shiprocket.in/shipment-tracking/ AWB: ​1904058187790     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.        Regards,  Devdas.

With regards to your order #651138902180814848-62134, I am sorry to know you have not received the medicine you ordered, XYGREL 90MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS quantities of 6. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologise for the inconvenience caused to you.     I am highlighting your concern to the Escalation team, and our team will investigate it. If the medicine is found to be missing, the refund amount of Rs. 1224.06 will be initiated. Post initiation of refund, the amount will be credited to your payment source within 5 to 7 working days.     You can expect the resolution within 24 to 48 hours. We will get back to you with an update once we receive it.      Further, was the parcel intact, or was there any damage from the outside at the time of delivery?     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Habiba
notes.body_html:
Hello Subhasis,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #651138902180814848-62134, I am sorry to know you have not received the medicine you ordered, XYGREL 90MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS quantities of 6. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologise for the inconvenience caused to you.

I am highlighting your concern to the Escalation team, and our team will investigate it. If the medicine is found to be missing, the refund amount of Rs. 1224.06 will be initiated. Post initiation of refund, the amount will be credited to your payment source within 5 to 7 working days.

You can expect the resolution within 24 to 48 hours. We will get back to you with an update once we receive it. 

Further, was the parcel intact, or was there any damage from the outside at the time of delivery?

I appreciate your patience in the meantime.

Regards,
Habiba

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Hi Pharmeasy Team,


I am writing to raise a strong complaint regarding the extremely
unprofessional experience I had with your lab test service today.


I had originally booked the 8:00–9:00 AM slot. Your phlebotomist called and
asked me to reschedule to 9:30 AM, assuring me that he would still arrive
by 8:30 AM. However, he neither arrived at 8:30 AM nor provided any update.
Due to this, I had to cancel the order altogether, which disrupted my plans
for getting these important tests done.


This level of service is highly disappointing, especially for something as
critical as diagnostic testing. I request you to take appropriate action
against the phlebotomist involved and ensure such incidents do not recur.


Thanks.

Sudarshan Agrawal

9891803608

--

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Lab order no. 6218822
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Hi Pharmeasy Team,

I am writing to raise a strong complaint regarding the extremely unprofessional experience I had with your lab test service today.

I had originally booked the 8:00–9:00 AM slot. Your phlebotomist called and asked me to reschedule to 9:30 AM, assuring me that he would still arrive by 8:30 AM. However, he neither arrived at 8:30 AM nor provided any update. Due to this, I had to cancel the order altogether, which disrupted my plans for getting these important tests done.

This level of service is highly disappointing, especially for something as critical as diagnostic testing. I request you to take appropriate action against the phlebotomist involved and ensure such incidents do not recur.

Thanks.
Sudarshan Agrawal
9891803608

helpdesk_ticket.description:
*Name:* Rohan Ravsaheb Magdum
*Address:* Namokar building, huwaj mala, A/P: Nandani, Tal: Shirol, Dist:
kolhapur, Maharashtra, India (Pin code 416102)
*Phone:* 8975144123
*Email:* rohanmagdum1008@gmail.com

*Opposite Party (Service Provider):*
PharmEasy
Legal Entity: Axelia Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
Registered Address: 902, 9th Floor, Hyde Park, Saki Vihar Road, Andheri
East, Mumbai – 400072
Email: care@pharmeasy.in / grievance@pharmeasy.in
*Complaint Details*

I, *Rohan Ravsaheb Magdum*, booked a full body check-up through the
PharmEasy application under:

*Lab Order ID: 6216531*
*Schedule:* 01-12-2025, 07:00 AM to 08:00 AM
*Assigned Technician:* *Mr. Nikhil Subhash Jagtap*

During sample collection at my residence, the technician made *eight (8)
failed attempts* to draw blood. His hands were trembling, and he was
clearly untrained. The process resulted in:

   -

   Severe injuries on *both arms*
   -

   Significant physical pain
   -

   Mental distress and trauma
   -

   Wasted blood
   -

   No sample collected
   -

   Zero service delivered

*Law Violations*

This case falls under the *Consumer Protection Act, 2019*:

*Section 2(11) – Deficiency in Service*
The case involves poor skill, untrained staff, and a failure to deliver the
promised service.

*Section 2(47) – Unfair Trade Practice*
The website promised 8–10 hours report delivery.
The technician informed us it would take 3+ days.
This is a misleading representation.

*Section 14 – Reliefs including compensation*
The complainant is entitled to compensation for physical injury, pain,
inconvenience, and emotional distress caused due to negligence.

*Section 17 – Jurisdiction of State Commissions*

*Evidence Attached*

   1.

   Screenshot of booking & order details
   2.

   Technician name & assigned time
   3.

   Images of both injuries on arms

I request the Hon’ble Commission to:

   1.

   Direct PharmEasy to provide:
   -

      *Full refund* of the service amount.
      2.

   Award monetary compensation of *₹1,00,000* for:
   -

      Physical injury
      -

      Emotional distress
      -

      Trauma & mental harassment
      -

      Wasted time & risk to personal health
      3.

   Direct PharmEasy to:
   -

      Improve technician training standards
      -

      Display *accurate report delivery timelines* on the platform
      -

      Not assign unqualified staff for medical services

*Declaration*

I affirm that the facts mentioned above are true to the best of my
knowledge and belief.

*Date:* 01/12/2025
*Place:* Nandani
*Thanks & Regards,*
*Rohan Magdum.*

--

Merged from ticket 22239681  
      Subject: Issue in Discount  
      Description:  Dear sir, This is to inform you that, I am purchasing some medicine from Pharmeasy app where discount is showing 27% on plus membership and coupon code which is already applied and meet the criteria also. 
 But when I am calculating the discount the result is 21.47%. 
 I am sharing the screenshot of the same. Please do the needful. 
   
 Thanking you 
   
 Ashok Kumar Patra 
 Registered Mobile No 9062178015

Merged from ticket 22239681

Subject: Issue in Discount

Description:
Dear sir,
This is to inform you that, I am purchasing some medicine from Pharmeasy app where discount is showing 27% on plus membership and coupon code which is already applied and meet the criteria also.
But when I am calculating the discount the result is 21.47%.
I am sharing the screenshot of the same. Please do the needful.
 
Thanking you

Ashok Kumar Patra
Registered Mobile No 9062178015

notes.body: Hello Ashok,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​   I understand your concern is related to the discount and I will surely assist you with this.  ​   The discount displayed in the search results is part of our “Best Pricing” feature. To avail this offer, you need to apply the appropriate coupon code, which is shown at the top of the cart page during checkout.     Please note that PharmEasy provides up to 10% product-level discount to all our customers. Further additional discounts can be availed based on the applicable coupon codes or vouchers available at the time of placing the order.  ​   As reviewed, you had applied the coupon code PEPLUS. According to the terms, this coupon offers 27% OFF on orders above Rs. 1500 on buying PharmEasy Plus membership (with a maximum benefit of Rs. 451). Also, get Extra 5% Plus PharmEasy Credits.   ​   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Ashok,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
​
I understand your concern is related to the discount and I will surely assist you with this.
​
The discount displayed in the search results is part of our “Best Pricing” feature. To avail this offer, you need to apply the appropriate coupon code, which is shown at the top of the cart page during checkout.

Please note that PharmEasy provides up to 10% product-level discount to all our customers. Further additional discounts can be availed based on the applicable coupon codes or vouchers available at the time of placing the order.
​
As reviewed, you had applied the coupon code PEPLUS. According to the terms, this coupon offers 27% OFF on orders above Rs. 1500 on buying PharmEasy Plus membership (with a maximum benefit of Rs. 451). Also, get Extra 5% Plus PharmEasy Credits. 
​
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Manisha

notes.body: Hello Ram,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #654075816408784896-61796, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.     As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 1st December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.     We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Ram,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #654075816408784896-61796, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 1st December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

To,
Whomsoever it may concern,
This is to bring into your notice that I'd ordered my medicines from
pharmeasy the details of which are attached below. The pharmacist called me
at around 9 am yesterday to confirm the order but I missed the call for
which the order was put on hold.. Within 5-10 min I called your customer
support and they said the pharmacist will call again.. It's been 24 hours,
I received no call and my order is still on hold.. I wonder if you provide
such poor service to a plus member whose your customer from around 5 years
what you do to the others.. Highly disappointed.

Kindly look into the matter. The medicines are my monthly order and if
delayed I'll order it from other platforms and would have to cancel the
order

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

helpdesk_ticket.description:
I had given blood samples for lab test. I got message that tests were not completed for technical reasons. Message copied below . 
As I needed reports fast, I proceeded with lab tests at other lab and requested refund for this order. 
Surprisingly I got reply on WA that amount will be refunded partially.  It’s so disappointing to note that instead of apology or compensation, you are charging me for your mistake. 
1 . It has caused me so much inconvenience 2. Total failure on your side, still told me that it will be partial refund 3. Total unprofessional behavior. Also customer care numbers are not reachable ?
I request quick reply and action to refund full amount. In case of single Rs deduction 1. I will stop all future purchases 2. Ensure that feedback is well heard on social media for customer awareness. 
Feel free to call me for any clarifications needed. 
Gajendra Rathi 9136843810

Dear Customer,  In regards to your order CTLSPAP34333968 and 69  We regret to inform you that your test could not be processed due to technical reasons, for carrying out the result against the same test we would need a fresh sample. Details of the benificiary and pending tests are as under :  Name - GAJENDRA RATHI / Madhuri Rathi  Tests - AAROGYAM A WITH UTSH,COMPLETE URINE ANALYSIS,HBA,HEMOGRAM - 6 PART (DIFF),FBS  Requesting you to please share us the convenient date and time to reschedule your sample collection.  Please note, 1. On receipt of your response we shall be processing for rescheduling your sample collection. 2. If you wish to speak with our customer support advisor you may reach us at  022-07022000900 3. While calling you can mention as you have initiated a call for rescheduling your sample collection for cancelled test to avoid any delay or inconvenience.  Regards, Team Pharmeasy


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

-- 


Disclaimer:

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Complaint - health check
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
I had given blood samples for lab test. I got message that tests were not completed for technical reasons. Message copied below . 

As I needed reports fast, I proceeded with lab tests at other lab and requested refund for this order. 

Surprisingly I got reply on WA that amount will be refunded partially.  It’s so disappointing to note that instead of apology or compensation, you are charging me for your mistake. 

1 . It has caused me so much inconvenience 
2. Total failure on your side, still told me that it will be partial refund 
3. Total unprofessional behavior. Also customer care numbers are not reachable ?

I request quick reply and action to refund full amount. In case of single Rs deduction 
1. I will stop all future purchases 
2. Ensure that feedback is well heard on social media for customer awareness. 

Feel free to call me for any clarifications needed. 

Gajendra Rathi 
9136843810


Dear Customer,
In regards to your order CTLSPAP34333968 and 69
We regret to inform you that your test could not be processed due to technical reasons, for carrying out the result against the same test we would need a fresh sample.
Details of the benificiary and pending tests are as under :
Name - GAJENDRA RATHI / Madhuri Rathi 
Tests - AAROGYAM A WITH UTSH,COMPLETE URINE ANALYSIS,HBA,HEMOGRAM - 6 PART (DIFF),FBS
Requesting you to please share us the convenient date and time to reschedule your sample collection.
Please note,
1. On receipt of your response we shall be processing for rescheduling your sample collection.
2. If you wish to speak with our customer support advisor you may reach us at  022-07022000900
3. While calling you can mention as you have initiated a call for rescheduling your sample collection for cancelled test to avoid any delay or inconvenience.
Regards,
Team Pharmeasy

notes.body: Hello Suranjan,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     We understand you wish to permanently delete your account with PharmEasy. We would be unable to delete the account from our database. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant governmental authorities.      Please note that once the account is deactivated, we are unable to process any requests or reactivate the account.     Once your request has been processed in the system, our agent will call within 24 to 48 hours on a registered mobile number and confirm if you have requested account deactivation. After verification, an OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number.  Once the OTP is verified, the agent will go ahead and deactivate your account       Kindly confirm so that we can proceed with the request.     Awaiting your earliest response.     Regards,     Habiba
notes.body_html:
Hello Suranjan,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

We understand you wish to permanently delete your account with PharmEasy. We would be unable to delete the account from our database. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant governmental authorities. 

Please note that once the account is deactivated, we are unable to process any requests or reactivate the account.

Once your request has been processed in the system, our agent will call within 24 to 48 hours on a registered mobile number and confirm if you have requested account deactivation. After verification, an OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number.  Once the OTP is verified, the agent will go ahead and deactivate your account  

Kindly confirm so that we can proceed with the request.

Awaiting your earliest response.

Regards,
Habiba

notes.body: Hello Deepak,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  Thank you for your time on the call. Pursuant to our conversation, a refund of Rs. 219.11 was already initiated on 30.11.2025; however, the same is rolled back by your bank due to instant discount received initially.      A manual refund of 219.11 will be initiated to your account again within 24-48 hours. Post initiation, the refund will be credited to your source account within 5-7 business days. Please note that Saturday, Sunday, and bank holidays are not included in this. We apologise for the inconvenience caused to you. Your patience is highly appreciated in the meantime.     In the future, please contact our Level 1 customer service team via a call to 8071324888 or send an email to care@pharmeasy.in. If your query remains unresolved for 7 days after you have reached out to our Level 1 Customer support, you can escalate the matter to us.   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.  Regards, Grievance Officer HelpDesk.
notes.body_html:
Hello Deepak,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

Thank you for your time on the call. Pursuant to our conversation, a refund of Rs. 219.11 was already initiated on 30.11.2025; however, the same is rolled back by your bank due to instant discount received initially. 

A manual refund of 219.11 will be initiated to your account again within 24-48 hours. Post initiation, the refund will be credited to your source account within 5-7 business days. Please note that Saturday, Sunday, and bank holidays are not included in this. We apologise for the inconvenience caused to you. Your patience is highly appreciated in the meantime.

In the future, please contact our Level 1 customer service team via a call to 8071324888 or send an email to care@pharmeasy.in. If your query remains unresolved for 7 days after you have reached out to our Level 1 Customer support, you can escalate the matter to us. 

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.

Regards,
Grievance Officer HelpDesk.
